page.title: 01GENERAL REVIEW
page.content: Most of our area is countryside.The rest is coniferous forest.There are no villages or towns in our area and the only places of residence are farmhouses.The forest is called DEVILLA and has been planted by the FORESTRY COMMISSION.Each of the farms locally are about 200 acres in size and grow crops mainly.Some farms keep beef cattle but only one farm has a dairy herd of 60 cows.There is a mine in our area which is not in operation although not officially closed down.The mine has a precarious history which is dealt with in another section. {ONE QUARTER - AREA FORESTED. {THREE QUARTERS- AREA ARABLE FARMING. {PLACES OF INTEREST- BOGSIDE MINE {CULROSS CEMETRY.
